name: Oxygen (MikyMoD)
description:
Oxygen is a 2D puzzle side-scroller game about the journey of an oxygen molecule getting is way through the obstacles of the beginning of time. If it won't be able to maintain the link between his parts all the way through the end of the journey, the sparkle of life will never blow and Life itself will never happen. Solve the puzzles by finding the perfect path in order to stay close with all your atoms if you want to save the future of the universe!

We are an independent team of passionate developers and your feedback is a huge help to our growth!
Thank you so much love from:
Mikymod (Programmer, Game Designer)
Jumbax (Composer, Sound Designer, and Sound Engineer)
Catoplepa (Game Artist)
Nath & Valjarjn (Design, Help in Brainstorming and Moral Support! :3)
